title: enna tAn sonnEn ivaL ippaDi mayangi
sahitya:
enne tAn sonnEn ivaL ippaDi mayangi vizha tapponrum illai kaNNan 
vandAn enru tAn shonnEn illai illai varuvAn enru tAn shonnEn


anupallavi
